content: Engineering and manufacturing companyThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "GES International" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(March 2021)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **GES International Limited** is an [engineering](/wiki/Engineering) and [manufacturing](/wiki/Manufacturing) company founded as a sole proprietorship called Goh Electronics Services by Goh Lik Tuan in 1975. It is based in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) and has an office in China. It is on the [SGX](/wiki/Singapore_Exchange), the Singapore stock exchange, and it is a listed component of the [Straits Times Index](/wiki/Straits_Times_Index). In 2006, it became a subsidiary of the Singapore-based Venture Corporation.[*citation needed*] GES has two R&D (Research and Design) centers, in Singapore and [Shanghai](/wiki/Shanghai) working in [original design manufacturer](/wiki/Original_design_manufacturer) (ODM) and [original equipment manufacturer](/wiki/Original_equipment_manufacturer) (OEM). GES International performs manufacture and design (including ASIC design) as well as shipping ([logistics](/wiki/Logistics)) and [aftermarket](/wiki/Aftermarket_(merchandise)) services.[*citation needed*] This [Singaporean corporation or company](/wiki/List_of_companies_of_Singapore) article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: GES International
